entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
